name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess in-depth expertise in developing robust APIs and software design best practices, focusing on high-performance solutions within cloud environments like **Google Cloud**. My technical skills include proficiency in **Kotlin**, **PostgreSQL**, **ElasticSearch**, and **Kubernetes**, enabling me to build scalable and efficient backend systems.
My background in **Python** reinforces my ability to contribute to complex projects while maintaining best practices in software architecture. In past roles, I have successfully mentored junior developers and provided technical leadership, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Additionally, I have hands-on experience with full-stack development and cloud services, having integrated AI/ML capabilities in enterprise-grade applications. I am passionate about fostering innovative solutions and driving process improvements in the development cycle.
